assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethical approval was obtained through the Royal Children’s Hospital, Melbourne, Human Research Ethics Committee (HREC #37353). Written informed consent was obtained from the participant or their parents/legal guardian in the case of minors or adults with intellectual disabilities.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
